page.title: 19SPORT IN EAST CLEVELAND.
page.content: There are many forms of sporting activities in our survey area. In summer;{Cricket, Bowls,}and{Quoits} take place, whilst in winter{Football} provides the main sport. Locally, Skelton, Lingdale, and Boosbeck all compete regularly on a Saturday afternoon. Games such as{Dominoes, {Darts, Snooker,}and{Billiards}are played regularly in the pub's of the area. School sport is played throughout the year. The seasonal variation differing from{Soccer, {Rugby, Cross Country, Hockey;}in the winter months to{Cricket, Athletics,} in the summer months. At Primary School level, there are inter-school games in{Soccer}and{Netball,}while at Secondary level there are inter-school games in most sports.
